profile.about: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. responsibilities: Developed Know Your Customer (KYC) application which automates verifying the identity of clients and assessing potential risks of illegal intentions for the business relationship; managing application deployment; Designing application architecture;
Developed automotive application for iOS and Android; Developing B2C features; Creating user interface based on provided mockups (Xamarin.Forms);

Developed mobile application for iOS and Windows that serves a navigation aid for both helicopter and aircraft pilots during all kinds of flight operations (C#, C++); Designing application architecture; Optimizing memory and CPU/GPU performance in order to improve device stability and battery life; Adopting and extending Tangram-ES map rendering library (OpenGL ES); Creating native bindings to managed code; Developing user interface based on provided mockups (XIB, XAML); Creating fully automated build processes using CMake and MSBuild; Participating in testing and bug fixing processes; Working closely with backend team, implementing application web interface (REST); Performing code reviews to keep systems up to standards; Working with clients to provide best solutions and validate requirements; Managing App Store and Windows Store deployments and publication processes;

Developed application for iOS that manages and synchronizes user expenses (C#); Developing REST integration, implementing expense OCR data recognition; Developing user interface based on provided mockups (XIB); Participating in testing and bug fixing processes;

Developed Android client for online distribution marketplace (Kotlin); Providing native application (Android); Developing REST client implementation; Designing and developing user interface based on web page mockups (AXML);

Developed cross-platform massive multiplayer online strategy game for iOS, Android and Facebook in C#; Designing and creating user interface; working closely with backend team, designing and implementing web interface (REST); Optimizing network performance based on prediction and request batching; Implementing number of external payment providers (Xsolla, Google Play, App Store);
Developed prototype of multiplayer third person shooter for PC (C#, Unity 3D); Developing network synchronization and replication;
Written a software to convert games from Torque Engine into Unity 3D in C#; ported serie of time management strategy games from PC to mobile;
Took a part in development of VR application for large area stores; developed a heatmap system to track client eyes in C++;
Created game framework in JavaScript and HTML5 (Canvas); developed over 20 simple educational games based on this framework;

Developed automated trading system (C#); Designing and developing distributed services (Akka.NET); Developing application interface (ASP.NET, Entity Framework, MS SQL); Creating trading algorithms; Integrating third-party services (REST, WebSocket);

Prototyped and developed first class secure messaging application for Android (Kotlin); Defining and creating a communication protocol built on top of blockchain technology; Designing and developing secure token authentication client; Implementing end-to-end data encryption based on Elliptic Curves; Developing hierarchical deterministic Bitcoin wallet; Designing and developing user interface (AXML); Participating in testing and bug fixing processes;
Third-party maintainer of Yahoo Flurry Analytics plugin for Unity 3D (C#, Objective-C, Java); Maintaining library with is listed on Yahoo official documentation.

profile.clause: I agree to the processing of personal data provided in this document for realising the recruitment process pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act of 10 May 2018 (Journal of Laws 2018, item 1000) and in agreement with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation)
